basics.name: Radosław Kołoczek
basics.label: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: I am passionate self-taught Frontend Developer with a strong focus on continuous improvement and learning. Started my coding journey in 2020 and have since honed my skills in various technologies. Open-minded and detail-oriented, I believe in delivering high-quality work. Eager to join a collaborative team where I can contribute my enthusiasm and continue to grow both technically and personally.

work.name: Smakuj Zdrowo
work.summary: The aim of the project was to encourage people to eat healthy and give them place to search for recipes, which are nutritious and easy to prepare. The project obtained the Brown Wolf Award for the best project at school.
highlights: Leading team and managing tasks in Trello
Creating a website for our project and improve SEO

education.institution: VIII Liceum Ogólnokształcące im. Hanny Chrzanowskiej w Bielsku-Białej

projects.name: Clothing Store
projects.description: The website provides features like creating an account, writing reviews, finding products, applying discount codes, adding products to the shopping cart and making a purchase payment.

projects.name: BeConnected
projects.description: The app enables users to follow friends, share posts, comment and edit personal profile. It also provides communication among users through a chat.
